Uses of Package
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils

Packages that use gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils
Package
Description
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.converter
The converter package contains classes for parsing and converting HL7 V2 messages, segments and datatypes into FHIR Bundles, Resources and datatypes respectively.
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils
This package contains utility classes for performing V2 to FHIR Conversions.
  • Classes in gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils used by gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.converter
    Class
    Description
    ErrorReporter
    The ErrorReporter interface provides a mechanism for reporting warning messages during processing, so that different implementations can handle warnings in a manner appropriate to their context.
  • Classes in gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils used by gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils
    Class
    Description
    ErrorReporter
    The ErrorReporter interface provides a mechanism for reporting warning messages during processing, so that different implementations can handle warnings in a manner appropriate to their context.
    IzQuery
    A structure to manage query parameters.
    Mapping
    This utility class supports mapping between coded values and system names in V2 and FHIR
    TestData
    TestData supports reading of HL7 messages or segments from text files in internal resources or external files, where each message or segment can have one or more assertions about the FHIR resource created from the content.
